desc: We're a startup cloud webhost with an excellent technical platform and non-existent sales. Looking for a top marketer to handle all aspects of our advertising - adwords, banners, seo, you name it - anything legal that does not involve spam (or any sorts of email marketing whatsoever). The freelancer will define and plan all our marketing efforts. Perfect English a must, we're targeting US as the primary market. Looking for top freelancers with top feedback for long-term cooperation.This project is currently close to zero revenue, slightly in the red, and our previous attempts to hire people ended nowhere. I'm offering the right candidate a partnership. We will turn the complete company over to you for two years and let you collect all profits you can make. Everything it earns, is yours. After two years have passed, we split profits 50/50.We will cover technical expertise; the platform is fully functional and works perfectly. Existing customers are very happy. We will continue handling the infrastructure, support, and billing. Everything is in place. All you need to do is sell. This is a huge opportunity for the right person.To make sure you understand the offer, start your cover letter with "i will receive the profit, not salary".Our main goal is to stop burying money and effort into the area we don't know well. You'll need to fund your marketing endeavours yourself, but won't have to invest into infrastructure - it's already in place, and monthly maintenance cost is nearly covered by the current revenue. Just get it selling and it'll start returning money. You will have complete access to the billing system and all the inner workings of the business, full disclosure. Your earnings will be handed over through [url removed, login to view] for the first two years.Happy bidding!
title: Marketing Guru for Cloud Hosting Services -- 2017

desc: NOTICE: For Philippine-based contractors only.Our consultancy firm is specialized in advising companies worldwide in their launch phase in the US. We have done business in the USA since 2004 and spearhead many services under different brands.We have a large array of projects ranging from demographic analysis, market product validation, strategic competitor analysis, to market test launch. Our firm has very hands on experience in the field of start-up launch in the US market.Our firm is looking to hire a star market research analyst with a vast experience in executing US market research projects. Our projects are a combination of both qualitative and quantitative analysis.You must have at least 3 years of experience working for a market research consultancy firm and numerous market research projects under your belt.Your will carry out each project from beginning to end. Therefore, you would need to have both the skills and the experience to handle the various aspects of the project. Each project does have a detailed outline of all the questions and topics needed to be covered.You would research the information, interview some industry players in the US, and write the report. You must be at ease writing grammatically correct sentences in both a clear and concise way. The projects varies in size and can be very small.As an ideal candidate you must have notable energy and enthusiasm with a passion for research and excellence. Being organized to meet deadlines is key.Soft skills needed for this position:- Dedicated & reliable. Getting things done no matter what. Work fast with little supervision- Energetic and positive. Be a team player and easy to work with. You like to socialize with our team members and our clients-Integrity. This is our motto in our company, in our team and in our business. We thrive on integrity-Ability to keep your cool under pressure. We like to say that patience is golden in our field of work-Problem solver. When you have a problem, you instinctively look for a solution or even many. You have an eye for details-Well organized. You like to plan your work ahead for the day and the week. Ability to set objectives and meet these objectives on timeYou will be part of our team who spans at the four corners of the globe! Our fast pace environment is a fertile ground to learn and grow.  You will work on a per assignment basis.Please provide us with your resume and a cover letter explaining how your experience can fill in the requirements of this position and why you’re interested in this position. We would need to know the types of market research reports you’re specialized in with sample of work you did in the past. Send all the requirements or inquiries to: admin@[url removed, login to view], and not via this website’s chat.**RATES posted are only for advertising purposes, we will tell you more about this in detail if you pass the initial screening through your submitted requirements.
title: Hire a marketing research assistant

desc: I am looking for a very efficient, talented person to work. People who are not good with this please don’t bid as I don’t want my time wasted in dealing with you.The Website will then be handed over to me with all admin rights.Project Description:I need a professional and reliable Google Adsense website maker who should be able to build a website that can generate income of atleast $ 15 to $ 20  PER DAY.   Only reply if you can do this, as 100% of the payment will be released once this income has been proven for atleast 60 days.You have to tell me how you grow traffic to website.Show me proof of income after 30 days of launching of website, daily statics report to be provided ( Unique Visitor, Unique clicks, ad clicked, text-ads clicked)The perfect person would be someone who is willing to give me a good and fair price and would be willing to work on future projects exactly like this for me as we build trust with each other. Provable Adsense income is a must.Only experience hard working bidders with proven record will be considered. Also, I would like to know what you are planning in advance in your PM'sSITE MUST ADHERE TO THE FOLLOWING:- Provide an overview plan before starting the project- Contain unique contents with unique posts/articles for six months (3 articles / week), but at least 50-65 articles that are not published yet in any media ie.e. newspaper, magazine, internet etc- Must be original and SEO optimized with frequently used keywords- Articles must be in proper English and must be Copyscape Clean ( will be checked manually by copyscape)- Must consistently generate at least $ 10 to $15 per day- All copyrights will be assigned to me in writing- Design must be neat and optimized to attract people to click on the ads- Unique traffic (NO bots, no systems or bought traffic) Follow Google Adsense Term & Conditions / Policies strictly- Must be optimized for Google Adsense- Must have my Google analytics code and my AdSense code installed, so i can track statistics and revenue!- Finished website must be installed on my hosting.- You must be able to guarantee consistent income (over $10 to $ 15 per day) for at least 12 months.- You have to tell me how you plan on making this possible.(USING ONLY WHITE-HAT SEO techniques).- Show me the proof of income after 30 days of launching the website. Day by day statistics are to be provided (Unique Visitor, Unique clicks, ad clicked, text-ads clicked).I am looking for good freelancers! Final payment will be made only if the above conditions are met!!The site can be about anything other than illegal activities, drugs, adult, gambling and other 'taboo' topicsThe site must be 100% legal and follow all rules and ToS from adsense, affiliate companies, etc.
title: Adsense Ready Website - Earning of $15 to $20 per day

desc: Job is perfect for someone who has a READY audience in instagram, facebook group or own blog. I just finished building a website, and would like to add some products to it. Basically it is an ecommerce website. I would like to hire someone, who knows how to bring sales, whichever way possible. There is no fixed budget for this, because job is commission based. i am ready to pay 10% of what the store makes regularly, to a prospective candidate who can keep marketing and selling. So, if you take this job, You agree to market and sell my stuff regularly, on a monthly basis, and i agree to pay you 10% from profit on a monthly basis. The ideal, is to get to $2000 a day in Sales, that way, You can make $6000 every month. Not bad, i think. I will be adding more products to a my store, and there is a big chance to make some good money with them. The products are coming from China (high quality ones), and will be serving US market mostly, but later on planning to export to Europe as well.Your Job is to market and sell, whichever way You want. If you have Your ready audience, encourage to buy, if you have a blog, advertise there, if You have any other marketing channel, that You know will pay off, You can go with that. Your task is to make sure that product is selling. Everything is transparent, i can add You to the website system, so you can see, how much the store makes a day, and 10% from profit, after expenses is Yours. Do contact me if You have any questions, let me know what you think, and i will be more than happy to answer Your questions. Everything can be negotiated and discussed. PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT OR PROPOSE UNLESS YOU AGREE FOR TERMS ABOVE, THIS IS NOT A FIXED BUDGET JOB, ONLY COMMISSION BASED. Thank You
title: Social Media Marketing , selling my webstore products

desc: Advertising Sales Representative for Agriculture Magazinuts and dried fruit).You work independently and commission-based.AgroPress offers an extremely beneficial commission system. The company has established client relationships and partnerships in the last 75 years.You will support our team selling print and online advertisements, corporate publishing services, web design, video production for the world of perishable items.Candidates with previous advertising sales experience are preferred and an agricultural background is beneficial. You might also be a sales representative in for fertilizers or crop protection products, machinery, technology or software - representing our publications could be an additional income with the same group of clients.About the magazines:The Clipper is the market leader in global information about nuts and dried fruit: Production and Consumption trends, science and technology, marketing and business strategies for Coconuts, Peanuts, Cashew nuts, Almonds, Walnuts, Chestnuts, Betel nuts, Hazelnuts, Pistachios, Kola nuts, Macadamia Nuts, Brazil nuts and dried fruit.Get more information at [url removed, login to view]The Fruit World has been established in 1943. It is distributed in 104 countries with more than 32,000 readers. It is the ideal platform to build trust and relationships across the globe. The Fruit World covers important trends - from new varieties to processing and packaging, marketing, shipping and logistics, digital solutions, politics and the retail sector. Our knowledge goes deeper than the press release: Our correspondents capture important developments all over the globe -traveling more than 400,000 km each year to find out what might be crucial for your future business, with original, hands-on information.Get more information at [url removed, login to view]

desc: My business will sell advertising space within the dry cleaning industry. There is a large franchise competitor marketing the same type of service, but their territory restrictions are too unrealistic. So, I plan to "go it alone" and operate as an independent sole proprietor as I know the industry well enough to prosper without franchise support. What I need is assistance in selecting a business name, creating a simple logo, and composing four specifically different advertising pieces (3 full-page flyers and one counter display) that will essentially be customized "knock offs" of my competitor's standard advertising flyers yet are distinctly more dynamic and independent enough so as not to plagiarize in any way. Although this is not a particularly large project at present, it has the potential to offer long-term repeat business to the professional who can deliver to supreme degree of satisfaction.
title: I need an Advertising Specialist for Business Startup I plan to launch in January 2018
